channel.title: Age of empires 2 120k$ prizepool tournament!
channel.description:
You read right, this old (first version came in 1999) game is still going strong, and in a week theres a 120k$ tournament starting.
http://www.voobly.com/files/view/22513445/k5u42hzn8bzbp3e0vnbguf79bghvqrj9/WiC%201alternative.png
Free to signup if anyone wants to, its a teamgame event so you need at least 4 people to form a team.
Id love to get a mopar team going, idc about peoples skill levels, as it will be for fun. All it requires is a copy of age of empires 2 + expansion (The conquers), an account on voobly (www.voobly.com) and aoczone (www.aoczone.net).
If you dont want to play but would like to see some awesome matches on this old lovely game (and possible cheer for your mopar buddies) all matches will be streamed: Follow vooblyofficial on twitch or go to aoczone for latest updates on when matches will be played.
